pli-tv-pvr18:1.1: There are offenses that are committed unconsciously, but cleared consciously.
pli-tv-pvr18:1.2: There are offenses that are committed consciously, but cleared unconsciously.
pli-tv-pvr18:1.3: There are offenses that are committed unconsciously and cleared unconsciously.
pli-tv-pvr18:1.4: There are offenses that are committed consciously and cleared consciously.
pli-tv-pvr18:1.5: There are offenses that are committed with a wholesome mind and cleared with a wholesome mind.
pli-tv-pvr18:1.6: There are offenses that are committed with a wholesome mind, but cleared with an unwholesome mind.
pli-tv-pvr18:1.7: There are offenses that are committed with a wholesome mind, but cleared with an indeterminate mind.
pli-tv-pvr18:1.8: There are offenses that are committed with an unwholesome mind, but cleared with a wholesome mind.
pli-tv-pvr18:1.9: There are offenses that are committed with an unwholesome mind and cleared with an unwholesome mind.
pli-tv-pvr18:1.10: There are offenses that are committed with an unwholesome mind, but cleared with an indeterminate mind.
pli-tv-pvr18:1.11: There are offenses that are committed with an indeterminate mind, but cleared with a wholesome mind.
pli-tv-pvr18:1.12: There are offenses that are committed with an indeterminate mind, but cleared with an unwholesome mind.
pli-tv-pvr18:1.13: There are offenses that are committed with an indeterminate mind and cleared with an indeterminate mind.
pli-tv-pvr18:2.1: How many originations does the first offense entailing expulsion have?

pli-tv-pvr18:5.3: body and mind, not speech; or
pli-tv-pvr18:5.4: speech and mind, not body; or
pli-tv-pvr18:6.1: The four offenses entailing expulsion are finished.
pli-tv-pvr18:7.1: There is an offense entailing suspension for emitting semen by means of effort. How many originations does it have?
pli-tv-pvr18:8.1: There is an offense entailing suspension for making physical contact with a woman. How many originations does it have?
pli-tv-pvr18:9.1: There is an offense entailing suspension for speaking indecently to a woman. How many originations does it have?
pli-tv-pvr18:9.3: body and mind, not speech; or
pli-tv-pvr18:9.4: speech and mind, not body; or

pli-tv-pvr18:11.1: There is an offense entailing suspension for acting as a matchmaker. How many originations does it have?
pli-tv-pvr18:11.3: body, not speech or mind; or
pli-tv-pvr18:11.4: speech, not body or mind; or
pli-tv-pvr18:11.5: body and speech, not mind; or
pli-tv-pvr18:11.6: body and mind, not speech; or
pli-tv-pvr18:11.7: speech and mind, not body; or
pli-tv-pvr18:12.1: There is an offense entailing suspension for having a hut built by means of begging. How many originations does it have?
pli-tv-pvr18:13.1: There is an offense entailing suspension for having a large dwelling built. How many originations does it have?
pli-tv-pvr18:14.1: There is an offense entailing suspension for groundlessly charging a monk with an offense entailing expulsion. How many originations does it have?
pli-tv-pvr18:15.1: There is an offense entailing suspension for charging a monk with an offense entailing expulsion, using an unrelated legal issue as a pretext. How many originations does it have?
pli-tv-pvr18:16.1: There is an offense entailing suspension for a monk who does not stop pursuing schism in the Sangha when pressed for the third time. How many originations does it have?
pli-tv-pvr18:17.1: There is an offense entailing suspension for monks who do not stop siding with one who is pursuing schism in the Sangha when pressed for the third time. How many originations does it have?
pli-tv-pvr18:18.1: There is an offense entailing suspension for a monk who does not stop being difficult to correct when pressed for the third time. How many originations does it have?
pli-tv-pvr18:19.1: There is an offense entailing suspension for a monk who does not stop being a corrupter of families when pressed for the third time. How many originations does it have?
pli-tv-pvr18:20.1: The thirteen offenses entailing suspension are finished
